name: Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce
author: RedNao

sections.description:
With this plugin you can change the appearance of your WooCommerce emails or even create new ones that are send when a condition is met. You can edit or add new elements to the email using the drag and drop builder. No coding skills are required.

Features

  • Create email templates using a drag and drop builder: No coding skill required all is done using a drag and drop designer (similar to elementor)
  • Custom conditions: Define a condition for each email, it will only be sent when this condition is met. Or you can send them manually whenever you want.
  • Style builder: Create visually stunning emails using our style builder or save a ton of time and use one of our pre-made templates.

Premium Features

  • There is also a premium version that has more features, you can get it here
  • Header Builder: Create attention grabbing headers using images that can be translated or edited directly within the email designer
  • Recommended Products: Add relevant products recommendations in your emails and increase your sales.
  • QRCodes: Add customized qr codes
  • Integration with other plugins: You can use our wizard to scan orders and include specific information from other plugins into the emails.
  • Translation ready: Send emails in the right language even in a multilanguage site.
  • Bulk actions: Send emails of several orders in bulk.
  • Access to premium template: Instead of having to create the template yourself you can pick one from our template library.
sections.changelog:
Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.29

  • Added background image feature

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.22

  • Added button block and improving performance

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.17

  • Added text editor to paragraph properties

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.16

  • Improving the ui

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.14

  • Added online preview

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.13

  • Added feature to preview emails

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.12

  • Fixed issue with inner section

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.10

  • Added feature to allow to add php code in custom fields

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.9

  • Added feature to manually send emails and send them in bulk

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.8

  • Added feature to attach files

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.3

  • Fixed issue rendering text with new lines

Advanced Emailing for WooCommerce 1.0.2

  • Added custom field

short_description: Customize your WooCommerce emails or create new one that are sent when a condition is met.

screenshots.caption: Create emails using a drag and drop builder.
You can customize the subject, who is going to receive the email, who is sending it etc.
Configure a condition, the email will be sent only when this condition is met.
